server

Class Translator

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.Translator

  • public class Translator
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class that translates between Java and JSON All ToJSON methods take given parameters and make the necessary JSON model for the server call fromJSON method takes JSON GameModel
